description.narrative: - Recycling industry: SIMPA is a pioneer using its scrap waste and externally sourced waste as recycled inputs in its production. - Increase supply of competitive FMCG packaging. - Employment: IFC investment will expand employment (expected creation of 300 direct jobs and 1200 indirect jobs). Technology transfer: SIMPA will acquire and run state of the art equipment in its operations.

IFC is considering providing financing to SIMPA (Societe Industrielle et Moderne des Plastiques Africains), a leading manufacturer of plastic packaging in Dakar, Senegal for expansion which will include (i) setting up a subsidiary greenfield packaging manufacturing plant in Abidjan, Cote dIvoire and (ii) modernizing existing production capacity in Senegal.
